title: Firm Retention Summary: Aearo Technologies LLC
text:
FIRM TO BE HIRED: McDonald Hopkins LLC

PRINCIPAL ASSIGNED TO THE CASE: David A. Agay

DUTIES: The firm will provide the following services:

•the tasks of reviewing, negotiating, evaluating, and approving a strategic transaction or a series of strategic transactions (each a "Transaction"); and

•certain rights, authority, and powers in connection with matters pertaining to a Transaction or any chapter 11 proceedings in which a conflict of interests exists or is reasonably likely to exist between the Debtors and any related party.

HOURLY COMPENSATION:

Members of the firm will be compensated at the following hourly rates:

Members $375 - $960

Of Counsel $345 - $910

Associates $250 - $495

Paralegals $185 - $345

CASE BACKGROUND: Aearo Technologies LLC, a unit of 3M Co., filed for chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on July 26.
